author: Seren Morris
title: Is the Post Office Open? Are Banks Open? The Essential Businesses Open During Stay at Home Coronavirus Orders
description: While non-essential businesses like dine-in restaurants and bars will be closed, essential services like post offices and banks will remain open.
content: As states have implemented stay at home orders to delay the spread of the coronavirus, many non-essential businesses, such as restaurants and bars, will be closed. But essential businesses, like grocery stores, will remain open, and people are allowed to leav… [+4982 chars]
